Additionally, the characteristics of spin transition in coor-
dination compounds are known to be extremely sensitive to
any changes in the chemical environment. As Hofmann
clathrate analogues are very easy to modulate, numerous SCO
complexes with very different temperatures, abruptnesses and
hystereses of SCO were obtained. Moreover, the ability of
Hofmann clathrate analogues to incorporate guest molecules
